verseBefore: All things are pure to those who are pure. But to those who are corrupt and unbelieving, nothing is pure, but both their minds and their consciences have been corrupted.
verseAfter: All things are pure to those who are pure. But to those who are corrupt and unbelieving, nothing is clean, but both their minds and their consciences have been corrupted.
gatewayLanguageQuote: believe, believes, believed, believer, belief, unbeliever, unbelievers, unbelief
